Package com.matsko.service

Interface FileService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileServiceImpl
    public interface FileService
    Service that receives the message and performs actions to download the file and store it in the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String generationLink​(java.lang.Long docId, LinkType linkType)  
      AppDocument processDoc​(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Message telegramMessage)
      A method that makes an HTTP request to the Telegram server.
      AppPhoto processPhoto​(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Message telegramMessage)
      A method that makes an HTTP request to the Telegram server.

    • Method Detail

      • processDoc

        AppDocument processDoc​(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Message telegramMessage)
        A method that makes an HTTP request to the Telegram server. If the request is successful, the body is converted into an object containing JSON. Then the path of the file is retrieved and a new request to the Telegram server is made along the known path to download the file as an array of bytes. Then an object is created, not linked to the database, in which the received array of bytes is placed. Then this object is stored in the database, and we get an object with a generated primary key. From this object, the document is retrieved and stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        telegramMessage - incoming message.
        Returns:
        data banked document.

      • processPhoto

        AppPhoto processPhoto​(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Message telegramMessage)
        A method that makes an HTTP request to the Telegram server. If the request is successful, the body is converted into an object containing JSON. Then the path of the file is retrieved and a new request to the Telegram server is made along the known path to download the file as an array of bytes. Then an object is created, not linked to the database, in which the received array of bytes is placed. Then this object is stored in the database, and we get an object with a generated primary key. From this object, the photo is retrieved and stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        telegramMessage - incoming message.
        Returns:
        data banked photo.

      • generationLink

        java.lang.String generationLink​(java.lang.Long docId,
                                LinkType linkType)
        Parameters:
        docId - Telegram file ID.
        linkType - resource identifiers used in link generation.
        Returns:
        link to download the file.
